TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Khpan, title = Khpan, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Khpan} }

S.FORM: == Khpan == u sulit nu Hulam: 大彎部落 u siwkay nu niyazu' i Taoyuan a kuwan ku niyazu' nu Khpan. u kasalumaluma' nu Khpan sa, 30 ku luma'. kumud nu kasabinawlan sa, 91 ku tademawan. kasabinawlan nu Ingcumin sa, 80 ku tademaw, pakalatu 88%. u zuma sa, cay ku Yingcumin, 11 ku tademaw, pakalatu 12%. u kasabinacadan, Tayan(Tayal) 75%, Pangcah(Amis) 3%, zumazuma 10%. u cidekay nu Taywan yincumin u siwkay nu Yincumin u Yincumin sananay, u saayaway a muenengay a tademaw itini, itini uyiniyan a subal. u sasubana'ay a kamu sa, Taywan Yincumin sa mikitinay "Timul Subal kamu cidekay " saan. u niyazu' sa, u luyaluy nu tademaw, pulung muengeneng, u kabana' kami, hina u lalumaay amin i niyazu', caay kayadah ku ihekalay a tademaw. silecaday a lalangawan, lisin, kamu, atu kabanaan. si kalilidan(Tumuk) saca babalaki mililid tu niyazu'. i Taywan Yincumin, izaw ku 16 cidekay puluung sa 748 a niyazu', maka 55 a mang a tademaw. satabakiaya a cidekay ku Pangcah(Amis), saadidi'ay a cidekay ku Laaluwa. u tabakiaya a niyazu' sa, ku Tapalong, u niyazu' nu Pangcah(Amis). situlu ku kakuniza nu Yincumincu,sakacacay ku ibukelalay, sakatusa ku ibuyuay, sakatulu sa ku tangbulanay. tademaw nu Yincumin, pulung sausi katukuh 2017 a mihca 12 a bulad tademaw nu Yincumin, pulung sausi katukuh 2018 a mihcan 12 a bulad pulung sausi (565,561), Pangcah (211,031), Tayan (90,884), Paywan (101,472), Yuwatan (58,894), Rukay (13,392), Puyuma (14,340), Cou (6,667), Saysiat (6,662), Yami (4,629), Saw (799), Kabalan (1,482), Taluku (31,826), Sakizaya (958), Sejek (10,193), Laaluwa (404), Kanakanabu (343), zuma (11,585)

== Khpan == o solit no Holam: 大彎部落 o siwkay no niyazo' i Taoyoan a kowan ko niyazo' no Khpan. o kasalomaloma' no Khpan sa, 30 ko loma'. komod no kasabinawlan sa, 91 ko tademawan. kasabinawlan no Ingcomin sa, 80 ko tademaw, pakalato 88%. o zoma sa, cay ko Yingcomin, 11 ko tademaw, pakalato 12%. o kasabinacadan, Tayan(Tayal) 75%, Pangcah(Amis) 3%, zomazoma 10%. o cidekay no Taywan yincomin o siwkay no Yincomin o Yincomin sananay, o saayaway a moenengay a tademaw itini, itini oyiniyan a sobal. o sasobana'ay a kamo sa, Taywan Yincomin sa mikitinay "Timol Sobal kamo cidekay " saan. o niyazo' sa, o loyaloy no tademaw, polong moengeneng, o kabana' kami, hina o lalomaay amin i niyazo', caay kayadah ko ihekalay a tademaw. silecaday a lalangawan, lisin, kamo, ato kabanaan. si kalilidan(Tomok) saca babalaki mililid to niyazo'. i Taywan Yincomin, izaw ko 16 cidekay poloong sa 748 a niyazo', maka 55 a mang a tademaw. satabakiaya a cidekay ko Pangcah(Amis), saadidi'ay a cidekay ko Laalowa. o tabakiaya a niyazo' sa, ko Tapalong, o niyazo' no Pangcah(Amis). sitolo ko kakoniza no Yincominco,sakacacay ko ibokelalay, sakatosa ko iboyoay, sakatolo sa ko tangbolanay. tademaw no Yincomin, polong saosi katokoh 2017 a mihca 12 a bolad tademaw no Yincomin, polong saosi katokoh 2018 a mihcan 12 a bolad polong saosi (565,561), Pangcah (211,031), Tayan (90,884), Paywan (101,472), Yowatan (58,894), Rokay (13,392), Poyoma (14,340), Coo (6,667), Saysiat (6,662), Yami (4,629), Saw (799), Kabalan (1,482), Taloko (31,826), Sakizaya (958), Sejek (10,193), Laalowa (404), Kanakanabo (343), zoma (11,585)
